```{r}
# --- Step 0: Load preprocessed test data ---
test_df <- readRDS("test_df.rds")

# --- Step 1: Apply PCA (use training PCA loadings) ---
test_pc <- predict(pcs, select(test_df, starts_with("V")) %>%
                     scale(center = pcs$center, scale = pcs$scale))[, 1:n_pcs_90] %>%
  as_tibble() %>%
  mutate(participant_id = test_df$participant_id)

# --- Step 2: Prepare and encode metadata ---
test_meta_prepped <- prepare_meta(test_df)
test_meta_enc <- bind_cols(
  as_tibble(encode(test_meta_prepped %>% select(-participant_id))),
  tibble(participant_id = test_meta_prepped$participant_id)
)

# --- Step 3: Merge PCA and metadata ---
test_merged <- inner_join(test_pc, test_meta_enc, by = "participant_id")

# Ensure test uses the same feature set and column order as training
X_test <- test_merged %>% select(all_of(colnames(X_train_lasso_pca)))

# --- Step 4: Generate base model predictions ---

# Ridge prediction
ridge_test_pred <- predict(cv_ridge_lasso_pca, 
                           newx = as.matrix(X_test), 
                           s = "lambda.min") %>% 
  as.vector()

# XGBoost prediction (ensure no column names)
X_test_mat <- as.matrix(X_test)
colnames(X_test_mat) <- NULL
xgb_test_pred <- predict(xgb_final, newdata = xgb.DMatrix(X_test_mat))

# --- Step 5: Stacking Ensemble Prediction ---
stack_test_input <- data.frame(
  Ridge = ridge_test_pred,
  XGB = xgb_test_pred
)
stack_test_dmat <- xgb.DMatrix(as.matrix(stack_test_input))
stack_test_pred <- predict(meta_xgb, newdata = stack_test_dmat)
```
